headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]

headline: Brighton Women sign Japan international Kiko Seike
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion have signed Japan international striker Kiko Seike from WE League champions Urawa Reds. The 27-year-old makes the move after spending 15 years with Urawa Reds, where she made more than 150 […]

headline: Melanie Leupolz departs Chelsea Women for Real Madrid
summary: Germany international midfielder Melanie Leupolz has left Chelsea after over four years with the Blues and signed for Real Madrid. Leupolz chalked up 44 appearances for Chelsea, whom she joined in March 2020 following a […]

headline: Newcastle United Women make Shania Hayles their first summer signing
summary: Newcastle United have signed Jamaican international striker Shania Hayles from Bristol City for an undisclosed fee. The 24-year-old played 22 times for Birmingham City and 44 games while at Aston Villa, whom she helped secure promotion […]

headline: Northern Ireland Women’s squad unchanged in Euro play-off bid
summary: Tanya Oxtoby retains the same 23 players in the Northern Ireland squad who faced Portugal in May and June, for this month’s Euro qualifiers. Cliftonville midfielder Louise McDaniel, who was a late call-up to the […]

headline: Hanna Bennison exits Everton Women and joins Juventus
summary: Midfielder Hanna Bennison has left Everton to join Juventus for an undisclosed fee and on a three-year contract. The 22-year-old Sweden international made 81 appearances and scored eight goals for Everton since signing for them […]

headline: Ireland Women’s squad selected to face England and France
summary: Ireland Head Coach Eileen Gleeson has selected a 26-player squad for the last two matches in their UEFA Women’s Euro 2025 qualifying group. They make the trip to Norwich City’s Carrow Road ground to face […]

headline: Chelsea Women sign Spain U-23 midfielder Julia Bartel from Barcelona
summary: Chelsea have signed 20-year-old Spanish youth international midfielder Julia Bartel from Barcelona until summer 2027, with the option of a further year. She played for Barcelona since 2019 and has captained both club and country, winning […]

headline: Sunderland Women sign ex-Leicester goalkeeper Demi Lambourne
summary: Sunderland have signed Demi Lambourne from Leicester City on a two-year contract, following the departure of Black Cats’ keeper Claudia Moan. Lambourne helped Leicester City secure promotion to the WSL in 2021, following that up […]

headline: Birmingham City Women sign Tegan McGowan from Charlton
summary: Tegan McGowan completes a transfer from Charlton Athletic to Birmingham City, the Welsh youth international signing a two-year deal. McGowan spent two years with the Addicks, making 25 appearances and scoring five goals, while internationally […]
